GTO Widget._gto_minium_width: width of the gto widget. If max=min not re-sizable!

GTO Toolbar._toolbar_height: sets a fixed height for all gto toolbars. default = null
GTO Toolbar._toolbar_no_tools: tools added to gto-toolbar when empty
GTO Toolbar._toolbar_moveable: true if GTO toolbar can be moved

GTO Tree._tree_expand: if the gto tree should expand all
GTO Tree._tree_single_click: if a leave opens on single-click

QGIS._qgis_stylefile: loads a style sheet for QGIS from ./gto/styles/
QGIS._qgis_icon: Icon in the titlebar of QGIS from ./gto/icons/
